game.description: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost city of Zerzura and bring it back to the village elder.
game.objective: The village is plagued by a terrible curse, and the only way to lift it is to retrieve an ancient artifact that has been hidden away in the lost city of Zerzura.
game.reward: A magical amulet that will protect the village from future curses, and 100 gold pieces.

tasks.description: Speak with the local guide, Ahmose, to learn more about the lost city of Zerzura.
tasks.objective: Gather information about the lost city and its dangers.

tasks.description: Journey through the desert to reach the entrance of the lost city.
tasks.objective: Reach the entrance of the lost city undetected by any enemies.

tasks.description: Navigate the ancient traps and puzzles within the lost city to reach the artifact.
tasks.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from its pedestal.

tasks.description: Return to the village elder with the artifact, and claim your reward.
tasks.objective: Complete the quest by returning with the artifact.

game.title: The Lost City of Zerzura
